did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Virginia Theatre & New Virginia Theatre. Playbills, 1914-1924
did.physdesc: This collection consists of nine items in one folder.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Virginia Theatre & New Virginia Theatre. Playbills, Accession # Flat 3022, Special Collections, Carrier Library, James Madison University, Harrisonburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Purchased from Bookworm & Silverfish Book Dealers, Wytheville, VA in Feb. 1995.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Theaters mentioned were located in downtown Harrisonburg, Va.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection is comprised of nine playbills (one folder) of the Virginia Theatre and New Virginia Theatre in Harrisonburg, VA, 1914-24 and undated. The largest size is 15" x 6". Each gives the title of the program (several specify vaudeville and minstrels), actors, and producers. Most playbills also include advertising by local establishments, especially W.E. Friddle's Restaurant, close to the Theatre.
